page: AG40009: Cad And Simulation Of Agricultural Machinery

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Computer Representation: Representation of two and three dimensional objects. Scaling, translation and rotation. Clipping. Rendering. Animation. Machine Vision: Digital image analysis. Automated thinning and pruning of plants. Site specific spray application. Analysis and Design: Force analysis and design of tillage implements, soil moving equipments and harvesting equipments.
page: AG40009: Cad And Simulation Of Agricultural Machinery
